name: Pirates of the Four Seas. PC Version
name_original: Pirates of the Four Seas. PC Version
description:
Pirates of the Four Seas Educational Software Computer Game for small children ages 3 to 6 years of age.

Join Captain Edward and the rest of the pirates on board a pirate ship in a journey to four different islands which could help your child's development skills. Each island has many different games for your child to choose from e.g. counting with numbers and counting with colours which will help your child to count as well as games which involve simple addition and subtraction.

The other games include letter games where there is a "hidden objects" pirate game as well as a "treasure world" game and a couple of puzzle games which are called "pirate picture crossword" and "pirate treasure maze" game and a shooting game which is called "pirate cannon ball blaster". The game has audio sound.

This game can be played on any PC computer or laptop computer.
